content: Drilling deeper into our business segments, first, our Office segment NOI increased to $6.9 million from $6.6 million in the prior year comparable period, driven by an increase in the NOI for our same-store office properties, primarily due to a decrease in real estate tax expenses at an office property in Austin, Texas, partially offset by a decrease in rental revenues and an office property in San Francisco, California due to a decrease in occupancy.
